Protocols/UICircularProgressRingDelegate.abstract: This method is called whenever the value is updated, this means during animation this method will be called in real time.

Protocols/UICircularProgressRingDelegate.abstract: This method is called whenever the label is about to be drawn.

Protocols/UICircularProgressRingDelegate.abstract: This is the protocol declaration for the UICircularProgressRing delegate property
